MorphAdorner Services Server

MorphAdorner Services Server provides synchronous web service interfaces to many MorphAdorner services. Most services are available using both GET and POST requests. The TEI processing services only work with POST requests.

GET Tests

  • Adorner for plain text
  • Corpus configurations
  • Gap filler
  • Hyphenator
  • Language recognizer
  • Lemmatizer
  • Lexicon lookup
  • Name extractor
  • Noun pluralizer
  • Parser
  • Sentence splitter
  • Spelling standardizer
  • Syllable counter
  • Text segmenter
  • Text summarizer
  • Thesaurus
  • Tokenizer
  • Verb conjugator
  • Version

POST Tests

  • Adorner for plain text
  • Corpus configurations
  • Gap filler
  • Hyphenator
  • Language recognizer
  • Lemmatizer
  • Lexicon lookup
  • Name extractor
  • Noun pluralizer
  • Parser
  • Sentence splitter
  • Spelling standardizer
  • Syllable counter
  • Text segmenter
  • Text summarizer
  • Thesaurus
  • Tokenizer
  • Verb conjugator
  • Version

POST Only Tests

  • Adorned TEI XML to tabular format
  • Adorner for TEI XML
  • Apply changes to an adorned TEI XML file
  • Compare two versions of an adorned file and generate an XML format change log
  • Extract TEI text
  • Extract sentences from adorned TEI XML
  • Move TEI notes to div
  • Tokenizer for TEI XML
  • Unadorner for TEI XML
